PABX System Installation Service In South India,INDIA

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#000000″ text_font_size=”12px” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_5_font_size=”14px” text_orientation=”center” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

QUALITY COMMUNICATION WITH OUR PABX/IP PBX SYSTEM INSTALLATION IN South India

FixLab is a leading provider of IP PABX system solutions in the INDIA, with extensive expertise in transforming businesses across various industries using cutting-edge technologies.Efficient communication is the key feature of any infrastructure, different forms of information flow from one source to another via the medium of the PABX system. It strengthens communication with varying points of contact through a secure private line. PABX /IP PABX system installation in South India by FixLab is technologically expertized in any  landscape.

We offer the best PABX system installation in South India, AbuDhabi, Sharjah, Ajman, and Ras Al Khaimah, INDIA for a start-up or upgrading your existing infrastructure.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#000000″ text_font_size=”12px” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_5_font_size=”14px” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

WHAT IS PABX SYSTEM?

The system that automates telephonic switching with a private network is a PABX installation. External calls enter the private network via a single contact point permitting extension units to communicate with each other internally is enabled through a Private Automatic Branch System (PABX) installation. Through the use of an intelligent automated switching system, PABX system installation permits the whole network to function with a live network.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjIzMDEyMSJ9fQ==@” button_text=”Contact Now” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”20px” custom_padding=”10px|35px|10px|35px|true|true” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://fixlab.co.in/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/pabx-2.png” alt=”PABX /IP PBX SYSTEM INSTALLATION IN South India,INDIA” title_text=”PABX /IP PBX INSTALLATION” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_image=”http://fixlab.co.in/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/small-inner.png” background_size=”contain” custom_padding=”2px||21px|||” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||23px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_2_font=”|600|||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_text_color=”#363636” header_2_font_size_tablet=”” header_2_font_size_phone=”25px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_2_line_height_tablet=”” header_2_line_height_phone=”1.2em” header_2_line_height_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Office Telephone system in South India ,INDIA

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||23px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://fixlab.co.in/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/Untitled-design-10.png” alt=”PABX/IP PABX SOLUTIONS South India,INDIA” title_text=”PABX/IP PABX SYSTEM SOLUTIONS South India,INDIA” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”|||0px|false|false” custom_padding=”|||0px|false|false” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#000000″ text_font_size=”12px” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_font_size=”9px” header_5_font_size=”14px” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

At FixLab , we provide advanced Office Telephone Systems designed to enhance business communication across South India and the INDIA. Whether you’re a small business or a large corporation, our telephone solutions offer reliability, scalability, and cost-efficiency to meet the dynamic needs of your organization.

Telephone Solution Provider in South India, INDIA

We partner with leading brands in the telecom industry to meet the diverse needs of our customers. Our product range includes the Avaya Telephone system, Panasonic Telephone system, Grandstream Telephone system, Samsung Telephone system, Yeastar Telephone system, Polycom IP phone system, and Yealink Telephone system. As one of the top telephone service providers in South India,  and across the INDIA, we extend our telecommunication services to major cities throughout the Middle East.

FixLab ’s loyal and trusted customers are classified into various segments, including Construction, Real Estate, Health Care, Financial Sector, Hospitality, Trading, Oil & Gas, etc

    Contact us today for a free consultation and quote!

    [/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjIzMDEyMSJ9fQ==@” button_text=”Contact Now” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”20px” custom_padding=”10px|35px|10px|35px|true|true” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_image=”http://fixlab.co.in/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/small-inner.png” background_size=”contain” custom_padding=”2px||21px|||” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||23px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_2_font=”|600|||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_text_color=”#363636” header_2_font_size_tablet=”” header_2_font_size_phone=”25px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_2_line_height_tablet=”” header_2_line_height_phone=”1.2em” header_2_line_height_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

      Benefits of PABX / IP PBX System Installation In South India,INDIA

    [/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”4px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF” transform_translate_linked__hover=”off” custom_padding=”15px|15px|15px|15px|true|true” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” border_width_top=”5px” border_color_top=”#363636” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ global_colors_info=”{}” box_shadow_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” box_shadow_color__hover=”#363636” transform_styles__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_scale__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_translate__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_rotate__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_skew__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_origin__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_translate__hover=”0px|-10px” border_width_top__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” border_width_top__hover=”5px” border_color_top__hover_enabled=”on|hover” border_color_top__hover=”#229DD1”][et_pb_blurb title=”BETTER MANAGEMENT OF INCOMING CALLS AND INTERNAL CALLS” alt=”technology” image_icon_width=”75%” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|600|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#363636” header_font_size=”14px” body_font_size=”12px” body_line_height=”1.5em” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

    Functionalities of PABX Installation in INDIA is enabled with a good PABX system installation in South India which ensures automated cell transferring. The best PABX installation in INDIA, providing the services of IP telephony builds the ability to choose to connect with a particular internal department via an automated attendant for the incoming caller.

    It has the capability of connecting an internal unit with another without any live operation if it is supported by efficient PABX installation in INDIA. PABX installation eases communication between two internal contact points with efficiency.

    [/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_padding=”15px|15px|15px|15px|true|true” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” border_width_top=”5px” border_color_top=”#363636” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ global_colors_info=”{}” box_shadow_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” box_shadow_color__hover=”#363636” transform_styles__hover_enabled=”on|hover” border_width_top__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” border_width_top__hover=”5px” border_color_top__hover_enabled=”on|hover” border_color_top__hover=”#229DD1” transform_scale__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_translate__hover=”0px|-10px” transform_translate__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_rotate__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_skew__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_origin__hover_enabled=”on|hover”][et_pb_blurb title=”SPEED DIALING AND AUTOMATED INQUIRY ASSISTANCE” alt=”settings” image_icon_width=”75%” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|600|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#363636” header_font_size=”14px” body_font_size=”12px” body_line_height=”1.5em” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

    Time management is maintained with PABX / IP PBX installation in INDIA when you contact clients, potential customers, and people outside the company on a daily basis. Faster communication is enabled with the feature of speed dialing by PABX system installation. PABX installation also allows an automated call-directing path which will be programmed into the IT system which enhances the communication quality.

    [/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_padding=”15px|15px|15px|15px|true|true” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” border_width_top=”5px” border_color_top=”#363636” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ global_colors_info=”{}” box_shadow_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” box_shadow_color__hover=”#363636” transform_styles__hover_enabled=”on|hover” border_width_top__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” border_width_top__hover=”5px” border_color_top__hover_enabled=”on|hover” border_color_top__hover=”#229DD1” transform_scale__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_translate__hover=”0px|-10px” transform_translate__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_rotate__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_skew__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_origin__hover_enabled=”on|hover”][et_pb_blurb title=”NAVIGABLE INTERFACE AND INCREASED CALL VOLUME” alt=”ip-camera” image_icon_width=”75%” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|600|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#363636” header_font_size=”14px” body_font_size=”12px” body_line_height=”1.5em” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]IP telephony provides a navigable user interface to accommodate voice interactive inquiry functions. It makes daily operations easy and efficient.

    An additional feature of enabling automatic receiving, handling, and redirecting multiple calls at the same time emphasizes IP PBX in South India. It restricts bogging down of the system.[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”-65px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_2_font=”|600|||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_text_color=”#363636” header_2_font_size_tablet=”” header_2_font_size_phone=”25px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_2_line_height_tablet=”” header_2_line_height_phone=”1.2em” header_2_line_height_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

     FAQ

    [/et_pb_text][et_pb_accordion open_toggle_text_color=”#363636” icon_color=”#363636” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” toggle_text_color=”#363636” toggle_font=”|700|||||||” toggle_font_size=”14px” toggle_line_height=”1.3em” body_text_color=”#000000″ body_font_size=”12px” border_radii=”on|20px|20px|20px|20px” border_width_top=”5px” border_color_top=”#363636” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_accordion_item title=”What is IP PBX?” open=”on” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

    IP PBX (Internet Protocol Private Branch Exchange) is a modern phone system that uses VoIP technology to manage calls over the Internet, allowing for the digital transmission of voice data.

    [/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”What are the main differences between PABX and IP PBX?” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” open=”off”]

    PABX (Private Automatic Branch Exchange) and IP PBX (Internet Protocol Private Branch Exchange) differ primarily in technology and functionality. PABX relies on traditional analog or digital telephone lines and circuit-switching, requiring dedicated hardware and physical infrastructure, which can complicate installation and maintenance.

    In contrast, IP PBX uses VoIP technology to route calls over the internet, simplifying setup and reducing costs by leveraging existing internet connections.

    While PABX offers basic features like call forwarding and voicemail, IP PBX supports a broader range of advanced features such as unified communications, video conferencing, and CRM integration.

    Additionally, scaling a PABX system can be cumbersome and expensive, whereas IP PBX allows for easy scalability with minimal infrastructure changes.

    Overall, IP PBX is often more flexible, feature-rich, and cost-effective, making it the preferred choice for modern businesses.

    [/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Can I use existing internet connections with IP PBX?” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” open=”off”]

    Yes, IP PBX can leverage existing internet connections, making installation simpler and often more cost-effective.

    [/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”What is PABX installation?” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” open=”off”]

    PABX installation refers to the setup of a Private Automatic Branch Exchange system, which is a private telephone network used within an organization. It allows internal communication among employees and manages external calls. The installation process typically involves configuring hardware, software, and network settings to facilitate call routing, voicemail, and other telecommunication features. PABX systems can be traditional (analog) or modern (IP-based), and they often include features like call forwarding, conference calling, and automated attendants.

    [/et_pb_accordion_item][/et_pb_accordion][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
